mapper.select: SELECT u.email, d.bzdt_nm AS title, CASE WHEN da.sbsc_acp_st_dt = #{today} THEN '접수 시작일' WHEN da.sbsc_acp_clsg_dt = #{today} THEN '접수 마감일' END AS type FROM bookmarks b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN danzi d ON b.danzi_id = d.danzi_id JOIN danzi_apply da ON d.danzi_id = da.danzi_id WHERE da.sbsc_acp_st_dt = #{today} OR da.sbsc_acp_clsg_dt = #{today}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookmarks WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND danzi_id = #{danziId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bookmarks where danzi_id = #{houseId}
